response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. I understand its significance and would like to extend a special offer. For a limited time, I am willing to sell this product to you for $1,200,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its true worth, allowing you to secure it without compromising on the quality or integrity of the product. I believe this is a fair and advantageous proposition for both parties. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
